ORG_0000003 - company

Label

company

Sub class of

ORG_0000001 - organization

Definition

A legal entity of associated persons created for a specific purpose, typically commercial, in which excess revenue may be distributed to the companyâ€™s owners.

Definition source

See https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/company

Example

BASF, The University of Phoenix, Facebook, Elsevier, Apple, Google, Amazon
